definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: In this image, stained retinal blood vessels are shown to emerge from the black-coloured optic disc.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片显示的是血管从黑色视盘中伸出。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the characteristics of morphosis parameter of optic disc of physiologic large cup.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察生理性大视杯视盘的结构参数特征。

sentences.english: To investigate the clinical manifestation and treatment of optic disc vasculitis .
sentences.chinese: 目的了解视盘血管炎的临床表现及治疗效果。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 25 cases with optic disc vasculitis were studied.
sentences.chinese: 方法对25例视盘血管炎的临床资料进行分析讨论。

sentences.english: Note its color, the sharpness of the margins, and the width of the physiologic cup.
sentences.chinese: 注意它的颜色，边缘的尖锐程度，以及视盘生理凹陷。

sentences.english: They've just lent me a laser disc player.
sentences.chinese: 他们刚借了我一部激光视盘播放机。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
anterior chamber (the front chamber of the eye)
ciliary body (in the eye, containing the focusing muscles)
